    • Constructor Detail

      • HandleConnectionThread

        public HandleConnectionThread(int id,
                              java.net.Socket socket,
                              GameMakerThread gameMaker,
                              ServerUI tui)
        Creates a connection handler with the specified id, socket and gameMaker.
        Parameters:
        id - the client's unique id.
        socket - the socket through which the client communicates with the server.
        gameMaker - the thread responsible for finding a game.
        tui - the user interface to write to.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Retrieves the name, extensions and preference of the client. Then generates a Player and adds it to the game maker's queue.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread
